text: Carlos Álvarez Nieto (born January 24, 1973 in Madrid) is a 5-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind. He played 5-per- team football at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Greece and, won 2-0. == References == Category:1973 births Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:Spanish 5-per-team footballers Category:Spanish footballers Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Carlos Álvarez Nieto
